name: Kobold Sorcerer Dragon Servitor
description: A small humanoid creature with draconic features, serves powerful dragons as a spellcaster and assistant. It has a good Dexterity but low physical strength, making it more suited for ranged attacks.
memorable: Its ability to change the damage type of its Flame Bolt based on its dragon master's breath weapon makes it a unique threat.
goals: To serve and protect its dragon master, often using cunning and magic to overcome foes.
relations: Often seen in the company of dragons, serving as minions or assistants to more powerful draconic beings.
environment: Commonly found in regions where dragons reside, such as caves or mountainous areas.
strengths: Possesses strong spellcasting abilities, agility to evade attacks, and versatility in damage types.
weaknesses: Very low Strength score hampers physical combat effectiveness, making it vulnerable in melee situations.
attacks: Uses Flame Bolt as a ranged attack and a Shiv for minor melee attacks, offering flexibility in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Innate spellcasting allows access to spells like charm person and mage armor, enhancing its defensive and coercive capabilities.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in low light.
skills: Proficient in arcana and intimidation, making it knowledgeable in magic and effective in coercing others.
additional_information: Changes Flame Bolt damage type to match its dragon master's breath weapon.
Can cast spells without needing material components.
Uses expeditious retreat to enhance mobility in combat.
Moderate challenge when encountered in groups.
Effective at ranged attacks with decent spell save DC.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma with spells like mage hand and charm person.
